snippet: John Isner and Sam Querrey used their big serves to blast the United States into a 2-0 lead over Brazil in a first-round Davis Cup match.
abstract: United States defeats Brazil, 2-0, in first-round Davis Cup match; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: John Isner and Sam Querrey used their big serves to blast the United States into a 2-0 lead over Brazil in a first-round Davis Cup match.

headline.seo: United States Leads Brazil at Davis Cup
headline.main: United States Leads Brazil at Davis Cup
